channel.title: The Desk Space
channel.description: Recent content on The Desk Space

item.title: Automating Financial reminders with the Plaid API!
item.description:
A look into how I built a financial reminder system using the plaid api and Google calender.

Introduction

Over Christmas break, I found myself thrown into the festivities, enjoying time spent with family, looking forward to the new year and preparing for it, that I missed my credit card payment for the month. Now you all may say, “oh that no big deal”. It is. I was using this card a lot through the month, so when the statement generated by my bank is sent to the credit brearu, it reduces my credit score. Now that I am not happy about.

item.title: Hello there!
item.description:
Welcome to my space!

Don’t mind the look of my desk—it’s just a reflection of all the exciting things happening here. As a software engineer pivoting into cybersecurity, and dabbling in techincal writing, there’s always something new in the mix.

This space will continulaly be developed, so stay tuned and I will show you around later. For now, Here is a project I recently worked on

Introduction to Plaid API Project
